scripts.dev: concurrently -n cli,cle,srv,tsc,math -c cyan,cyan,red,red,blue 'npm run dev --workspace=quest-client' 'npm run build:dev --workspace=client-embed' 'npm run start:dev --workspace=quest-server' 'npm run build:dev --workspace=quest-server' 'export $(cat .env) && cd math && clojure -M:run full'
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve:prod
scripts.build: rimraf client/build client-embed/dist server/dist && npm run build:prod --workspace=quest-client && npm run build:prod --workspace=client-embed && copyfiles -E -u 2 "client/build/**/*" server/dist/client && copyfiles -E -u 2 "client-embed/dist/**/*" server/dist/embed && npm run build --workspace=quest-server
